British Women Gamble Online

10 Aug 1999

In the first UK survey on gambling, MORI have found that women find gambling online far more attractive than gambling in traditional British gambling establishments. It also found worrying levels of gambling amongst children, a large number of whom thought Internet gambling is regulated.

See the full story at the BBC.
